name: Wandering Ward
flavor: A subtle nudge away from an area.

purposeDescriptions.low: gentle misdirection. Affected creatures will wander away from the Form, unless they have good reason to pass through
purposeDescriptions.mid: misdirection. Affected creatures will actively avoid the Form, sometimes becoming confused by the deflection
purposeDescriptions.high: psychic deflection. Affected creatures will experience mental pain and will attempt to avoid the Form however possible
purposeDescriptions.invLow: passive attraction. Creatures outside the Form will be subconciously encouraged into the Form
purposeDescriptions.invMid: attraction. Creatures outside the Form will feel an otherworldly encouragement to enter it
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: psychic honeypots. Creatures outside the Form will attack each other in an attempt to enter the Form at almost any cost
